query.statement: UPDATE MAS_CLOSE_MODIFYREQ SET TEAM_MST_SABUN = #g_EmpNo# , TEAM_MST_CONGUBN = DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', 'Y', 'N') , TEAM_MST_DATE = DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', SYSDATE, NULL) --, APPROV_SABUN = DECODE(#CLS_GUBN#, 'Y', #g_EmpNo#, APPROV_SABUN) --, APPRV_GUBUN = DECODE(#CLS_GUBN#, 'Y', DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', 'Y', 'N'), APPRV_GUBUN) --, APPRV_DATE = DECODE(#CLS_GUBN#, 'Y', DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', SYSDATE, NULL), APPRV_DATE) --ÆÀÀå½ÂÀÎ ½Ã ¿Ï·áÃ³¸® , APPROV_SABUN = DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', #g_EmpNo#, APPROV_SABUN) , APPRV_GUBUN = DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', 'Y', 'N') , APPRV_DATE = DECODE(#TEAM_MST_CONGUBN#, '1', SYSDATE, NULL) , ATTR03 = #TEAM_MST_CONGUBN# , ATTR04 = SYSDATE , ATTR05 = 'MAG10123E_U001' WHERE REQ_ID = #REQ_ID#
